description: Try our easy to follow Vampire Freakshake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Vampire Freakshake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g vanilla ice cream (100g in the shake, 100g on top)

recipeInstructions.text: To make the chocolate dip for the glasses, break the chocolate into small pieces and place into a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave the chocolate in 30-second bursts until just melted.
Prepare two tall glasses by placing the glass upside down in the melted dark chocolate to form a chocolate ring around the rim of the glass.
Cover the chocolate rim on the glass with the red sprinkles by holding the glass over a plate and gently shaking the sprinkles on top. Leave the glass upright to set.
In a blender, add the milk, vanilla bean paste, red food colouring and vanilla ice cream and mix on medium-high speed until combined.
Divide milkshake between the prepared glasses and add a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
